resources.name: Post Contact
resources.description:
### All field's are required
- type: email | phone
- contact: max(32) | exact(11)

### Authenticated route

The route requires authentication using a Bearer token. Please include the Bearer token in the 'Authorization' header of the request.

Ex:
```
headers:{
authorization: "Baerer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpYXQiOjE2ODU3MTIwMTEsImV4cCI6MTY4NTcxOTIxMSwic3ViIjoiOTVjYWM3NjAtOGJhMi00MmM4LTkxMDEtMDc4YWQ3ODYxYzVlIn0.pep7GgxD7cNwMHXahqQzAyMiXlIjvHvxppsag-9nczQ"
}
```


### Success return
STATUS 201 CREATED
```json
{
	"name": "new contact 2",
	"id": "8c20c3af-9026-405c-bc48-bb2dece6ba88",
	"createdAt": "2023-06-02",
	"contacts": [
		{
			"type": "email",
			"contact": "new2@example.com",
			"createdAt": "2023-06-02",
			"updatedAt": "2023-06-02",
			"id": "b214fac8-6d9e-45a3-a17b-36b5b544d9a6"
		},
		{
			"type": "phone",
			"contact": "55441234568",
			"createdAt": "2023-06-02",
			"updatedAt": "2023-06-02",
			"id": "29b73318-b467-4cac-954c-8073d4b18c6c"
		},
		{
			"type": "phone",
			"contact": "55447896543",
			"createdAt": "2023-06-02",
			"updatedAt": "2023-06-02",
			"id": "a97a8ad9-752f-47d9-b692-6b77943f15d1"
		}
	]
}

```

### Failed return
STATUS 401 ANAUTHORIZED

Error messages indicating the missing token.
```json

{
	"message": "Missing bearer token"
}

```

resources.name: List customers
Post customer
resources.description:
### All field's are required
- name: string max(20)
- email: string max(35)
- phone: string exact(11) 

### Authenticated route

The route requires authentication using a Bearer token. Please include the Bearer token in the 'Authorization' header of the request.

Ex:

headers:{

}

STATUS 201 CREATED
```json
{
	"name": "new contact",
	"id": "0a159528-4158-447a-b7ab-0c80e3f8d0d1",
	"createdAt": "2023-06-02",
	"contacts": [

			"updatedAt": "2023-06-02",

}

```

### Failed return

resources.name: Post login - Success
resources.description:
### All field's are required
- email: string max(35)
- password: string max(32) 

### Not authenticated route

### Success return
STATUS 200 Ok
```json
{
	"token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpYXQiOjE2ODU3MTIwMTEsImV4cCI6MTY4NTcxOTIxMSwic3ViIjoiOTVjYWM3NjAtOGJhMi00MmM4LTkxMDEtMDc4YWQ3ODYxYzVlIn0.pep7GgxD7cNwMHXahqQzAyMiXlIjvHvxppsag-9nczQ"
}

```

### Failed return
STATUS 401 UNAUTHORIZED

Error messages indicating the credentials are not valid.
```json

{
	"message": "Invalid credentials"
}

```

### Failed return
STATUS 400 BAD REQUEST

Error messages indicating the credentials are missing.
```json

{
	"message": {
		"email": [
			"Required"
		],
		"password": [
			"Required"
		]
	}
}
```

resources.name: Patch user
resources.description:
### All field's are optionals
- name: string max(20)
- email: string max(35)
- password: string max(32) 

### Authenticated route

The route requires authentication using a Bearer token. Please include the Bearer token in the 'Authorization' header of the request.

Ex:
```
headers:{
authorization: "Baerer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpYXQiOjE2ODU3MTIwMTEsImV4cCI6MTY4NTcxOTIxMSwic3ViIjoiOTVjYWM3NjAtOGJhMi00MmM4LTkxMDEtMDc4YWQ3ODYxYzVlIn0.pep7GgxD7cNwMHXahqQzAyMiXlIjvHvxppsag-9nczQ"
}
```


### Success return
STATUS 200 OK
```json
{
	"name": "username",
	"email": "validmail@mail.com",
	"id": "569f5866-b226-4981-9951-c347b89c1c4c",
	"createdAt": "2023-06-02"
}

```

### Failed return
STATUS 401 ANAUTHORIZED

Error messages indicating the missing token.
```json

{
	"message": "Missing bearer token"
}

```

resources.name: Post user
resources.description:
### All field's are required
- name: string max(20) 
- email: string max(35) unique
- password: string max(32) 

### Not authenticated route

### Success return
STATUS 201 CREATED
```json
{
	"name": "username",
	"email": "validmail@mail.com",
	"id": "569f5866-b226-4981-9951-c347b89c1c4c",
	"createdAt": "2023-06-02"
}

```

### Failed return
STATUS 400 BAD REQUEST

Error messages indicating the validation errors for each field.
```json

{
	"message": {
		"name": [
			"String must contain at most 20 character(s)"
		],
		"email": [
			"String must contain at most 35 character(s)"
		],
		"password": [
			"String must contain at most 32 character(s)"
		]
	}
}

```
